titles.title: Expressing support for the work of open water lifeguards as first responders and emergency response providers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution expresses support for the work of open water lifeguards as first responders and emergency response providers.
